abstract: 'If life was a movie, what then?'
description: Marten McEachran might be a normal schoolkid, but he also leads another, secret life. These lives co-exist happily and McEachran recognises that it is both lives that make him who he is.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Title; B2002108; Western stories : expressions for the future : Digital Storytelling project; Active; Jul 2007
